is_free.question: Is BuildMyResume really free?
is_free.answer: Yes, completely! There are no hidden fees, subscriptions, or locked features.

no_account.question: Do I need to create an account?
no_account.answer: No account, no email, no sign-up required. You can build your resume right away.

privacy.question: Is my data really private?
privacy.answer: Yes. Your data is encrypted in your browser and never stored or logged.

ats_friendly.question: Are the templates ATS-friendly?
ats_friendly.answer: Yes. All templates follow ATS best practices for maximum compatibility.

template_count.question: How many resume templates are available?
template_count.answer: We offer 15+ professional resume templates across different categories including Professional & Traditional, Modern & Contemporary, ATS & Applicant Tracking, Technical & Engineering, Creative & Design, Elegant & Premium, and Minimalist & Clean.

template_categories.question: What types of resume templates do you offer?
template_categories.answer: We offer templates in 7 categories: Professional & Traditional (3 templates), Modern & Contemporary (3 templates), ATS & Applicant Tracking (1 template), Technical & Engineering (2 templates), Creative & Design (2 templates), Elegant & Premium (2 templates), and Minimalist & Clean (2 templates).

template_customization.question: Can I customize the resume templates?
template_customization.answer: Yes, all templates are fully customizable. You can edit text, change colors, adjust layouts, and modify any content to match your personal style and requirements.

template_export.question: What file formats can I export my resume to?
template_export.answer: You can export your resume as PDF (ATS-friendly) or JSON (for backups or reuse). The PDF format is optimized for job applications and printing.
